iebaker.neon.core

Class Application

  • java.lang.Object
    • SwingFrontEnd
      • iebaker.neon.core.Application

  • public class Application
extends SwingFrontEnd
    Application is the main class which any game must extend to use the Helium engine. An application owns a list of screens, a ScreenManager object with which to manipulate the screens, a data manager which can be used to store application-wide data, and a size parameter which holds the current view size and is used for layout. Application exists mostly to propagate input and drawing/ticking to its screens.
